About

The element displayed above is the footer element. The footer should be used on every page of the website and should be found at the very bottom of the page, hence the term 'footer'. It contains a site map aswell assets contact information and links to the sites social media pages.

<footer> <div class="wrap row small-up-1 medium-up-3"> <div class="column"> <h4>Contact Info</h4> <hr> <a href="#"><span>Phone</span> 234 234 2340</a> <a href="#"><span>Email</span> info@company.com</a> <a href="#"><span>Address</span> 123 Center Street</a> </div> <div class="column"> <h4>Site Map</h4> <hr> <a href="#"> About Us</a> <a href="#"> Services</a> <a href="#"> Contact Us</a> </div> <div class="column"> <h4>Social Media</h4> <hr> <a href="#"> About Us</a> <a href="#"> Services</a> <a href="#"> Contact Us</a> </div> </div> </footer>
